intro: Muscles work in pairs called antagonistic pairs. They can only pull, not push.

hotspots.label: Relaxed Biceps
hotspots.info: When the arm straightens, the biceps becomes longer and thinner (relaxed).

hotspots.label: Contracted Triceps
hotspots.info: The extensor muscle. It pulls to straighten the arm.

hotspots.label: Contracted Biceps
hotspots.info: The flexor muscle. It bulges and shortens to bend the arm.

hotspots.label: Relaxed Triceps
hotspots.info: It relaxes to allow the biceps to bend the arm.

hotspots.label: Tendons
hotspots.info: Non-elastic fibers joining muscle to bone (T-M-B).

hotspots.label: Radius
hotspots.info: The moving bone that the biceps pulls on (thumb side).
